title: Who do I contact to make a complaint about iSmash which Google recommends for Pixel repairs?
content:
My situation is summarised in this review of the company.
https://uk.trustpilot.com/submitted/review?correlationid=80b76aeb-ba49-46eb-a7bf-e323f28f4c2b

Who do I contact at Google to let them know that their authorised repairer is not only negligent of GDPR but having shown little to no semblance of customer service?
